name: Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon
description:
Wanna stick it to the man, and make MAD CASH in the process?

Put down the bizz-ong (just for a minute) and download Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon!

On a tiny island in the Pacific Northwest, a lovable group of stoners are taking their family firm worldwide!

Shorty, Dave, and Uncle Floyd grow the best kush, hands down... But they need YOUR help to save their home from a greedy billionaire.
He's got cash to burn and a crew of dickish henchmen who won't rest until they get their sausage-like hands on the deed to the farm!

Everybody knows that the only way to smoke a billionaire... is to become one yourself!

• INVEST! Fight fire with fire and start pulling down some SERIOUS figures by turning a humble commune into a global cannabis empire!

• UNLOCK! Collect an assortment of freaky pot heads, cuddly critters, and far-out 420-friendly businesses!

• IMPROVE! Free to play, groove to win! Earn dope rewards in frantic BONGO BATTLES!

• PROFIT! Wanna get rich? Watch your earnings grow higher and higher... and HIGHER!

• REPRESENT! Help Uncle Floyd and the gang plant the seeds of a worldwide cultural revolution!

Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon is free to download, with new content being added just as fast as we can crank it out!

The surgeon general warns that Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon may be habit-forming! He knows what he's talking about. Not only is he surgeon, but he's also a friggin' GENERAL!

Bud Farm: Idle Tycoon is free to download and play, but some game items can be purchased for real money. A network connection is not required, but you will have limited access to in-game functions.
